sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-container>
      <v-row>
        <v-col cols="12">
          <v-card>
            <v-card-title>Projects</v-card-title>
            <v-divider></v-divider>
            <v-row>
              <v-col cols="12" md="6">
                <!-- Project List -->
                <v-list>
                  <v-list-item v-for="(project, index) in projects" :key="index" @click="selectProject(project)">
                    <v-list-item-content>
                      <v-list-item-title>{{ project.name }}</v-list-item-title>
                    </v-list-item-content>
                  </v-list-item>
                </v-list>
              </v-col>
              <v-col cols="12" md="6">
                <!-- Project Description -->
                <v-card flat>
                  <v-card-title>Description</v-card-title>
                  <v-card-text>{{ selectedProject.description || 'Select a project to see the description' }}</v-card-text>
                </v-card>
              </v-col>
            </v-row>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-container>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        projects: [], // This will hold the list of projects
        selectedProject: {}, // The currently selected project
      };
    },
    methods: {
      selectProject(project) {
        this.selectedProject = project;
      },
      async fetchProjects() {
        // Fetch the list of projects from the backend
        try {
          const response = await axios.get('/api/projects');
          this.projects = response.data;
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('Error fetching projects:', error);
        }
      },
    },
    mounted() {
      this.fetchProjects(); // Load projects when component mounts
    },
  };
  
  </script>
